front.title: IANA Allocation Procedures for OTN Signal Type Subregistry of the GMPLS Signaling Parameters Registry

abstract.t: IANA has defined an "OTN Signal Type" subregistry of the"Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) SignalingParameters" registry. This draft updates the OTN Signal Typesubregistry to allow Specification Required policies, as defined inRFC 5226.
